column2:
**gln** - string (13); the GLN number of the organization that is associated with the authorized user of the EDIN 2.0 platform at the account level

**doc_uuid** - string; document UUID COMDOC
The body of the request method transmit `data for performing the acceptance operation <https://wiki.edin.ua/en/latest/integration_2_0/APIv2/Methods/EveryBody/ComdocAcceptRequest.html>`__
